Operation time: Monday - Thursday 5:30pm-10:30pm          Friday - Saturday 5:30pm-11:30pm          Sunday: CLOSED    Christmas: CLOSED    Please note! We are currently featuring a menu from Chef JJ Johnson, our very first chef-in-residence. From now until December 31st, he will take over the space and the menu, showcasing dishes from his forthcoming "Afro-Asian" concept. Note: his will be the only menu available at that time!     Join us on New Year's Eve! We will offer two menus of Chef-in-Residence JJ's favorite Afro-Asian menu items: "99 Problems," 3-courses for $99 per person, and "I Got 5 On It," everything on the menu for $555 (for parties 7+). Reservations after 8:45pm includes a Champagne toast, live DJ and party favors.

name: Gramercy Tavern

Operation time: Dinner: Sunday 5pm-11pm, Monday-Thursday 5pm-12am, Saturday 5pm-1am.    Brunch: Saturdays and Sundays 11:30am-4pm.    Happy Hour: (Sunday and Monday, 5pm - close and Tuesday - Friday  5-8pm): $1 Oysters, Happy Hour Bites & half-priced select wines and beers in the bar + lounge.     Wine Wednesday: Every Wednesday from 5pm - close, 1/2 price all bottles of wine $200 and under in the bar + lounge.     Social Mondays (since 2005): Every Monday, "buy one get one" at the bar, featuring guest DJs.
